Patients receive primary suboptimal liver allograft transplantation ( donor > 65 year and/or liver macrosteatosis > 15 % ) randomise one follow treatment arm : Group I : steroid bolus ( intraoperative ) monoclonal anti-IL2R antibody ( daclizumab ) induction tacrolimus Group II : steroid bolus ( intraoperative ) tacrolimus steroid
